segments.text: Looking at the boy on the stool, I can't help but feel a sense of danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so high to reach the cookie jar, and that stool looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the stool hasn't tipped over yet with the way he's leaning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, waiting for a cookie, completely unaware of the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout out and warn them, but I know they can't hear me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to see them in such a precarious situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's focus is solely on those cookies, nothing else seems to matter to him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he gets down safely before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman drying dishes hasn't noticed any of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is making me feel really anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR
